mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, DEL, READCOUNT FROM BBS ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS(SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, DEL, READCOUNT) VALUES(SEQ_BBS.NEXTVAL, #{id}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF)+1, 0) FROM BBS), 0, 0, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE BBS SET STEP = STEP + 1 WHERE REF = (SELECT REF FROM BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) AND STEP > (SELECT STEP FROM BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS(SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, DEL, READCOUNT) VALUES(SEQ_BBS.NEXTVAL, #{id}, (SELECT REF FROM BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}), (SELECT STEP FROM BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) + 1, (SELECT DEPTH FROM BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) + 1, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
